thread.title: Amazing boutique hotel, super super super service, incredible location
thread.title_full: Amazing boutique hotel, super super super service, incredible location - Review of Hotel Le Walt, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: CharlotteBT
title: Amazing boutique hotel, super super super service, incredible location
text: Exceptional boutique hotel, exceptionally clean larger rooms than a lot in paris, beautifully decorated and furnished, 24 hour room service, wonderful service, the extras matter, bar, room service, great courtyard, little business centre, complimentary mini bar, umbrellas. The property is in a truly wonderful location, 1 minute walk to the base of the Eiffel Tower, 5 minute walk to Rodin, Invalides, Armee museum, gorgeous shopping alley 1 minute walk with exceptional boulangerie, patisseries, fromageries ... resturaunts on the door step, so is a metro and a supermarket across the road .. I received a great rate, much cheaper than the rate direct through booking,.com which made this exceptional value for money, otherwise maybe a but pricey. The team should be proud.
